responsibilities: Design and build innovative new systems from the ground up.
Write code, complete programming projects, and perform testing and debugging of Oracle software.
Work on cutting-edge technologies to tackle real-world problems in a collaborative, agile environment.
skills: Proficiency in at least two programming languages: Java, Python, C#, SQL, JavaScript, CSS, HTML.

Knowledge and experience in Artificial Intelligence, Algorithms, Big Data, Data Structures, Database, Machine Learning, Object-Oriented Programming, Software Programming, Web/Mobile Development, Micro-Services Architecture, Container Architecture (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), User Interface Design.
analysis: The job responsibilities include designing and building innovative systems, writing code, and working on cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative environment. The skills required include proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, and C#, as well as knowledge in areas like Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Big Data. While the job involves AI and Machine Learning, there is no specific mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be on general AI and software development rather than specifically on GenAI or LLMs.
